description: Melrose Apple (Malus 'Melrose') is a highly desirable landscape and garden tree. With its attractive white blooms in spring, and its bright red fruit turning to dark yellow in the fall, this deciduous tree is a sight to behold! The bright red, sweet and tart apples of the Melrose variety are sure to be a hit with everyone. Melrose Apple is resistant to many of the most common apple diseases, making it an ideal variety for commercial planting in many areas. With an easy-care nature, it's an excellent choice for home gardens. Its stunning foliage and tasty fruit make the Melrose an amazing tree for any landscape!
